name: 5tt2gmwmi
synopsis: Generate a mask image appropriate for seeding streamlines on the grey matter-white matter interface
author: Robert E. Smith (robert.smith@florey.edu.au)

references: Smith, R. E.; Tournier, J.-D.; Calamante, F. & Connelly, A. Anatomically-constrained tractography:Improved diffusion MRI streamlines tractography through effective use of anatomical information. NeuroImage, 2012, 62, 1924-1938

options.description: Filter an input mask image according to those voxels that lie upon the grey matter - white matter boundary. If no input mask is provided, the output will be a whole-brain mask image calculated using the anatomical image only.
do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.
force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).
use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).
temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.
display this information page and exit.
